title: Cheese Burger
description: Our cheeseburger is made with a juicy beef patty cooked to perfection, topped with melted cheese, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomato, served on a toasted bun with a side of golden fries. It's the classic American entree that never goes out of style.

title: Pizza
description: Our pizza is made with a crispy, thin crust and topped with your choice of savory meats, fresh vegetables, and melted mozzarella cheese. It's the perfect entree to share with friends and family, or to enjoy as a satisfying meal on your own.

title: Ribeye Steak
description: Our ribeye steak is a tender and juicy cut of meat, cooked to your desired temperature and served with a side of saut√©ed vegetables and creamy mashed potatoes. It's the perfect entree for any meat lover looking for a satisfying and hearty meal.

title: Filet Mignon
description: Our filet mignon is a tender and flavorful cut of beef, cooked to perfection and served with a side of roasted root vegetables and creamy mashed potatoes. It's the ultimate indulgent entree for any special occasion or romantic dinner for two.

title: Jambalaya
description: Our filet jambalaya is a spicy and flavorful Cajun dish, made with tender chunks of filet mignon, spicy sausage, and a medley of vegetables, all cooked together in a rich tomato-based sauce and served over a bed of fluffy rice. It's a hearty and satisfying entree that will transport your taste buds straight to Louisiana.

title: Cobb Salad
description: Our filet cobb salad features tender slices of filet mignon, crisp bacon bits, hard-boiled eggs, and creamy avocado, all served over a bed of fresh greens and drizzled with a tangy vinaigrette dressing. It's a satisfying and flavorful entree that's both healthy and indulgent.

title: Salmon
description: Our filet salmon is a fresh and healthy entree, grilled to perfection and served with a side of roasted vegetables and fluffy quinoa. It's the perfect choice for anyone looking for a light and flavorful meal.

title: House Pasta
description: ur house pasta is a classic and hearty dish, featuring perfectly cooked pasta tossed with a rich and savory tomato-based sauce, seasoned with aromatic herbs and spices, and topped with freshly grated Parmesan cheese. It's the perfect entree to enjoy on its own or paired with a side salad or garlic bread.

title: Chicken Parmesan
description: Our chicken parmesan is a classic Italian dish, featuring tender and crispy breaded chicken topped with melted mozzarella cheese and a rich tomato sauce, served over a bed of perfectly cooked spaghetti. It's the ultimate comfort food entree that's sure to please everyone.
